section_title: Guidelines on reporting and review of greenhouse gas inventories
sentences: The Secretariat reported on the latest national greenhouse gas inventory data from Annex I Parties for 1990 to 2000.
He said greenhouse gas emissions and removals data is available from 39 out of 40 Annex I Parties.
enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
